Title: Relates to automatic enrollment and recertification simplification for Medicaid eligible recipients
Summary: Provides for automatic enrollment and recertification simplification for Medicaid managed care plans and long term care plans.
LawCode: Amd ยง4403-f, Pub Health L; amd ยง366-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the social services law, in relation to automatic enrollment and recertification simplification for Medicaid eligible recipients
